original_text: In my Father's house are many rooms. If it were not so, would I have told you that I go to prepare a place for you?
korean_text: 내 아버지 집에 거할 곳이 많도다 그렇지 않으면 너희에게 일렀으리라 내가 너희를 위하여 거처를 예비하러 가노니

sentences.original_text: In my Father's house are many rooms.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지 집에 거할 곳이 많다.

sentences.original_text: that I go to prepare a place for you?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 위해 갈 곳을 예비하러 간다고.
